root.name: Aero Fighters
root.description: Aero Fighters is a vertical shooter. It's special feature is the ability to choose different characters from around the world. Each one has their own fighter plane with different fire power to kill the enemy. Each character also has a different ending after beating the game.Nations and Characters to select from:USA: KeatonUK: WilliamJapan: HienSweden: KohfulJapan: Mao Mao
